E-commerce Store

A clean and modern full-stack e-commerce platform with React (Vite) frontend and Laravel (SQL) backend, designed for easy product, order, and user management.

HODOCOLLECTION is a modern full-stack e-commerce platform combining a React.js (Vite) frontend with a Laravel + SQL backend.
It delivers a smooth shopping experience with product browsing, secure checkout, and an intuitive admin panel.

‚ú® Features

  • üõçÔ∏è Product Management ‚Äì Add, edit, categorize, and filter products easily.
  • üîê Authentication ‚Äì Secure login/registration powered by Laravel Sanctum.
  • üõí Shopping Cart & Checkout ‚Äì Real-time cart updates and simple checkout flow.
  • üìä Admin Dashboard ‚Äì Manage products, users, and orders in one place.
  • üé® Modern UI/UX ‚Äì Built with Tailwind CSS, Material UI, and Shadcn UI.
  • ‚ö° Fast & Scalable ‚Äì Optimized frontend with React (Vite) and REST APIs.

üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

  • Frontend: React.js (Vite), Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Shadcn UI
  • Backend: Laravel, SQL Database
  • Authentication: Laravel Sanctum
  • Styling/UI: Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Shadcn UI

üöÄ Getting Started

Prerequisites

  • Node.js (v16+)
  • Composer
  • PHP (v8+)
  • MySQL / SQL Database

Installation

Frontend (React + Vite)

# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/hussainanjan5/hodocollection.git

# Navigate to frontend
cd hodocollection/frontend

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run development server
npm run dev

Frontend will run at ‚Üí http://localhost:5173/

Backend (Laravel)

# Navigate to backend
cd hodocollection/backend

# Install PHP dependencies
composer install

# Setup environment
cp .env.example .env

# Generate app key
php artisan key:generate

# Run migrations
php artisan migrate

# Start local server
php artisan serve

Backend will run at ‚Üí http://localhost:8000/
